name: Come together (Lola Brozio, nils gawlik, Felix Szczesny)
name_original: Come together (Lola Brozio, nils gawlik, Felix Szczesny)
description:
You begin as a red dot. Your quest: Come together to become an awesome Rainbow.

Programming: Nils Gawlik

Game Design & Programming: Felix Szczesny

Art & Level Design: Lola Brozio
